subject: #SSN3472
description_text:
Hi,

Any update when this order will be shipped?

Thanks

Audrius

conversations.body_text: Hi Audrius Kliopkinas,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Our German warehouse is currently out of stock, with restocking expected by the 28th. At that time, we will ship your order via DHL and issue a refund for the additional shipping charges.
